amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to supporting or expediting the deployment of carbon capture, utilization, and sequestration technologies.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3284 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3284 proposed by Senator Capito. (consideration: CR S6218; text: CR S6218) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to supporting or expediting the deployment of carbon capture, utilization, and sequestration technologies.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3284 proposed by Senator Capito.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3284 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
